body: So since Tournament 5 is over, it is a valuable time to keep moving and make Tournament 6 the best tournament we could create. Of course, the first step of the way to a better tournament is getting a gamemode quick so we are able to produce maps quickly. Here is a poll for the community: http://www.strawpoll.me/12922414, it is multiple choice if you feel 1 or 2 answers would be the best for the next tournament, please discuss as well why you think something may or may not work. We would love to have your input. Also yes I am tryharding for Official. Sue me.
body_tagged: So since Tournament 5 is over, it is a valuable time to keep moving and make Tournament 6 the best tournament we could create. replies.body: All the Tournaments have gamemodes that are similar in skill. CTW and DTM basically have the same exact skill set, all about strats. TDM is some sense is relevant to 5CP. This last tournament was mainly strong pvp but with some strategy. Mix the two, a pvp gamemode and a strat gamemode.
